name: KidsMathChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open math challenge”
”Alexa, start the math challenge”
”Alexa, math challenge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math challenge
des:
1/6/2018 - Made the answer responses a little more natural. You can just say the answer alone now.

NEW UPDATE: Reduced level two's range of numbers to 0-15 to add additional practice with subtraction on smaller numbers. Level three is now addition and subtraction between 0-100. And level four is now the basic multiplication practice. If you have any suggestions please feel free to leave a review with your ideas.


This Alexa skill asks math questions and checks your given answer. There are multiple levels to choose from to help practice and improve kids math skills. Level one includes addition of numbers between zero and fifteen. Level Two has addition and subtraction of numbers between zero and fifteen. Level Two has addition and subtraction of numbers between zero and one hundred. Level four tests basic multiplication of numbers between zero and twelve. This skill doesn't have any special requirements just an Alexa device. If you have an Alexa show the given equation will pop up on the screen. 

User Guide:

Select the level when prompted by saying : "level one", "level two", "level three", or "level four".

To answer a questions use the phrase: Simply say the answer or use the phrases "The answer is..." Or "It is...."

If a question is too hard simply say "I can't solve this" or "This is too hard " and Alexa will get you a new question.

You can also say "help" at any time to get instructions on how to use the skill at any time.

To cancel or stop the skill you can say "quit".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
